testcase.classname: User must be able to access the correct site.

testcase.classname: Results relevant with the searched product should be displayed.
testcase.name: The product searched by typing in the search box must be related to the searched product.
testcase.failure:
* User goes to trendyol.com.................................................failed Given Accept the cookies....................................................skipped Then Click the search box field.............................................skipped And Type the searching word.................................................skipped Then Click search icon on the right side of searching fieldbox..............skipped Then Verify that the page related to the searched product has been reached..skipped And Close the page..........................................................skipped

testcase.classname: The user should be able to add any product to their cart without any problems.
testcase.name: The searched product should be added to the cart and it should be seen that it is in the cart.
testcase.failure:
* User goes to trendyol.com.................................................failed Given Accept the cookies....................................................skipped Then Click the search box field.............................................skipped And Type the searching word.................................................skipped Then Click search icon on the right side of searching fieldbox..............skipped Then Click the product......................................................skipped And Choose foot size number.................................................skipped Then Click add to cart......................................................skipped Then Click my cart button...................................................skipped Then Verify product add to cart.............................................skipped And Close the page..........................................................skipped
